entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Button on a CollectionView's EmptyView is not clickable on Windows #21935
  • Action Sheet is displayed behind the popup page #21934
  • HttpClient on Android sends wrong content-type header with ByteArrayContent #21933
  • Can't publish MAUI project for android #21931
  • "Timespan.Days property not found" when production app released to iOS App Store #21930
  • Seeing error The program '...Program Trace' has exited with code 0 (0x0) #21924
  • UIDevice.CurrentDevice.Orientation return Unknown in 8.0.20 works in 8.0.6 #21922
  • Broken MSBuild on Android Build .NET MAUI #21921
  • MaximumWidthRequest should not include Margin #21917
  • Net 8: Page and control Unloaded events firing on iOS when navigating to another page #21916
  • SwipeView does not honor MaximumHeightRequest in windows #21915
  • Cache Memory keeps increasing when taking photo using "Microsoft.Maui.Media.MediaPicker.CapturePhotoAsync() " causing app to Crash #21914
  • CollectionView does not adjust the size of a group when items in the group change size in ios and android #21913
  • SwipeItemViews do not work. #21911
  • The "XamlCTask" task failed unexpectedly. #21910
  • Custom entry control in tie iOS app - Ended is not firing unless focus is changed to another entry, seemingly breaking HideSoftInputOnTapped attribute #21905
  • Startup project crashes after splashscreen on iPadOS and .NET8.0 in release mode #21903
  • [WinUI3] Program has exited with code 2147942405 (0x80070005) #21901
  • FlexLayout - Layout cycle detected. Layout could not complete. #21898
  • .NET MAUI Problem with rendering TableViewRenderer on Android #21896
  • .NET MAUI Problem with rendering RecyclerView.ViewHolder on Android #21895

Closed

  • MAUI webapi call fails FATAL #21893
  • [iOS] CollectionView gets moved when keyboard or picker show up #21630
    .NET 8 SR4
  • Android Platform App Theme does not automatically update when switching themes #21774
    .NET 8 SR4
  • I AM ON .NET 9.0 AND STILL CANT COMPILE A SIMPLE HELLO WORLD IN C# , what kind of trash are you guys selling up there ? why cant we develop .NET apps on C# ? #21929
  • Whole App Shell and Shell content disapear when changing between tabs fast enough (Release mode on Android) #18555
  • Packaged Windows App Missing Permissions after installed? #21626
  • Widespread memory leak propagation in visual trees #21809
    Backlog
  • CollectionView is not currently being Garbage Collected #20710
    .NET 8 SR4
  • MAUI 7.0.58 does not yet include this fix, however the upcoming 7.0.59 release will include it. #21899
  • Hello lovely human, thank you for your comment on this issue. Because this issue has been closed for a period of time, please strongly consider opening a new issue linking to this issue instead to ensure better visibility of your comment. Thank you! #21900
  • Privacy updates for App Store submissions #21907
  • Duplicate symbol build error #21483

PullRequests

Created

  • [main] Merge SR4 to main #21936
  • Fixes KeyboardAutoManagerScroll when using scrollable Editor #21932
    community ✨
  • [controls] fix leak in ImageSource, caused by Task that never completes #21928
    area/image :framed_picture:, memory-leak 💦
  • [Trimming] Enable analyzers in Controls.Xaml #21927
  • [Trimming] Enable analyzers in Controls.Core on Tizen #21925
  • [Android] Geolocation IsListeningForeground property is always false #21919
    community ✨
  • [Testing] Split up current appium tests into separate projects #21908
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [UI Test] Create a new UITest for ModalPageMarginCorrectAfterKeyboardOpens #21897
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, area/keyboard

Merged

  • 8.0.21 Release Branding #21937
  • [iOS] Fix KeyboardScrolling for controls inside the NavBar #21806
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/shell 🐢, area/keyboard
  • Update locker.yml #21894
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, community ✨
  • [iOS] Fix crash closing Popup with WebView #21923
    .NET 8 SR4
  • [C] Propagate resources when reparenting #21879
  • [cake] add `SourceGen.UnitTests` #21889
  • [ios/catalyst] fix memory leak with CollectionView #21850
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/collectionview 📃, memory-leak 💦

Updated

  • [Windows] Clamp images inside buttons to button width/height #21733
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • [ios/catalyst] fix memory leak in gestures #21887
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/collectionview 📃, memory-leak 💦
  • Fix null reference exception in KeyboardAutoManagerScroll when UIWindow is null #21753
    community ✨
  • [UI Testing] Add legacy tests #21840
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, testing-legacy-ui-tests
  • [iOS] Allow compat iOS buttons to resize image and to respect spacing and padding #21759
    platform/iOS 🍎, partner/cat 😻, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • `LayoutHandler.Windows`: Store children to a local variable #21792
    area/perf 🏎️, community ✨
  • [Windows] Remove 2nd WebView used to add `base` tag when using HtmlWebViewSource #21892
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • [iOS] Fix issue that does not allow scrolling in WebView with PDF #21571
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • Wrap Image with a container on Windows so that it is centered with AspectFill #17665
    platform/windows 🪟, area/image :framed_picture:, do-not-merge
  • [Android] Fix Ripple Effect in ImageButton #21638
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-button, .NET 8 SR5
  • [Testing] Rework Appium Runner so that it goes directly to tests instead of navigates #20700
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #21092
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, do-not-merge, area/infrastructure 🏗️
